text: Megan Fox does not often share photos of her kids, but she just shared a pic of her youngest son Journey River Green. Earlier this weekend, the 32 - year - old actress shared the photo of her youngest son, who was born in 2016. PHOTOS : Check out the latest pics of Megan Fox Megan and Brian Austin Green have two other sons, 5 - year - old Noah and 4 - year - old Bodhi. Megan posted the photo on her Instagram account and captioned the photo with, “ Mood. ” See the adorable photo from Megan ’ s Instagram account below …
